name: Chocolate Trifle
author: Donna Stamp

ingredients.name: baked angel food cake, torn into bite-size pieces
small pkg. fat free chocolate pudding
Skor candy bar or 1 Butterfinger candy bar

instructions: Mix pudding according to package directions. In a punch bowl layer 1/2 angel food cake pieces, 1?2 mixed pudding, 1?2 container Cool Whip, and 1?2 crushed candy bar. Repeat layers ending with crushed candy bar on top. Chill until ready to serve.
